game.title: Eon's Shadow
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of Aria, a young timekeeper tasked with repairing the fabric of reality. As they journey through mystical realms and battle against rival factions vying for control, Aria must confront their own dark past and the true nature of time itself.
game.beginning: Aria's village is destroyed by an unknown force, and they soon discover a mysterious artifact that holds the key to manipulating time. Guided by enigmatic allies, Aria sets out on a quest to repair the fractured timestream.
game.ending: As Aria masters their newfound abilities, they face off against the mastermind behind the destruction of their village: a powerful entity known only as "The Time Reaver." In a final showdown, Aria must choose between restoring balance to the timestream or succumbing to its darkness, forever changing the course of history.
